org.letras.psi.ipen
Interface IPen

All Known Implementing Classes:
PenService
public interface IPen

This interface defines the methods provided by each pen as part of the interface between the raw data and the region processing stages. Implementing classes (or distributed objects generated of this interface already bound to

Version:
0.0.1
Author:
felix_h

Method Summary
 java.lang.String channel()
          Used to obtain the name of the channel this pen will publish its samples on.
 java.lang.String penId()
          This method can be used to obtain the unique id of this pen.
 int penState()
          This method can be used to determine the current state of a pen.
 

Method Detail

penId

java.lang.String penId()
This method can be used to obtain the unique id of this pen.

Returns:
the unique pen id

channel

java.lang.String channel()
Used to obtain the name of the channel this pen will publish its samples on. Usually the channel will already be used to receive the RMC, but its name is not necessarily known on the calling side.

Returns:
name of the individual channel this pen publishes on

penState

int penState()
This method can be used to determine the current state of a pen.

Returns:
state of the pen as defined in IPenState
